channel.title: IT on LC-Research
channel.description: Recent content in IT on LC-Research

item.title: Connecting TWS Earbuds to Any TV or Projector
item.description: Is there anyway to watch movies on the big screen (TV or projector) without disturbing others? Can two people share wireless audio at the same time? What about TWS earbuds? Can we use them with our TVs?

item.title: Setting up a Raspberry Pi Media Server
item.description: I got a whole bunch of movies, audio files and photos on my laptop. I am tired of copying these files to other devices at home. Is there anyway to keep them in one location and stream to all of my TVs, mobile phones, tablets and computers on the home network.

item.title: My First Glide App
item.description: I need to develop a personal mobile app that works on android. But, I don’t have much time on hand or coding skills required. I hear there are platforms that can turn spreadsheets into mobile apps. Is it even possible? How long would it take to build one from scratch?

item.title: Getting Rid of ._ and .DS_Store Files
item.description: I just got some folders from a Mac user. I see hundreds of ._ files and .DS_Store files all over my file system. Is it safe to delete these files? How can I get rid of them quickly?
